comments.creator: Scite
comments.author: Joost Kuijer, VUmc
comments.description: WAD MR configuration for Siemens scanners

params.match: Match with DICOM SeriesDescription, or use format @<field>=<content> to match with another DICOM field. Multiple criteria separated by ;

params.type: Type of B0 scan. Valid entries are GE_VUMC_custom, GE_B0map, Philips_B0map, PhilipsDoubleEcho, SiemensPhaseDifference, SiemensServiceStimEcho
params.match: Match with DICOM SeriesDescription, or use format @<field>=<content> to match with another DICOM field. Multiple criteria separated by ;
Match with DICOM SeriesDescription, or use format @<field>=<content> to match with another DICOM field. Multiple criteria separated by ;
params.image: instance number for geometry. Valid: <number>, firstInSeries, lastInSeries

params.autoComment1: Copy DICOM info. Format: ac.description='<your description>'; ac.field='<DICOM field name>';
params.TxAmplType: Data type of the DICOM field, valid entries are Matlab types. For GE use 'int16', for Siemens use 'char'
params.TxAmplPattern: Text pattern preceding the Tx Amplitude in text string, for Siemens use 'flReferenceAmplitude = '
params.TxFreqField: <DICOM field name> where transmitter frequency is stored
params.resultsNamePrefix: Prefix for results parameter name. For DICOM field used @<DICOM field name>
params.TxAmplField: <DICOM field name> where transmitter amplitude is stored
params.autoComment2: If not using an autoComment, leave empty or use: ac.description=''; ac.field=''
params.TxFreq_f0_MHz: <reference frequency in MHz>. Reported value for TxFreq is difference of actual and reference. Choose '0' to disable.
params.match: Match with DICOM SeriesDescription, or use format @<field>=<content> to match with another DICOM field. Multiple criteria separated by ;
Match with DICOM SeriesDescription, or use format @<field>=<content> to match with another DICOM field. Multiple criteria separated by ;
params.combinedImage: Instance number of combined image. Valid: <number>, firstInSeries, lastInSeries, inNextSeries
params.ROIradius: in [mm]. ROI size for SNR, ghosting and uniformity.
params.backgroundROIsize: in [mm]. Background ROI size for SNR and ghosting. Default value 7.
params.backgroundROIshift: in [mm]. Background ROI position (relative to phantom centre) for SNR and ghosting. Default value 108

params.logMode: 0 = quiet, 1 = to logfile, 2 = to screen, 3 = to log + screen
params.copyOutputDir: Create a copy of the module data/output directory for development and debug purposes. Leave empty to disable.

params.ROIradius: in [mm]. ROI size for SNR, ghosting and uniformity.
params.backgroundROIsize: in [mm]. Background ROI size for SNR and ghosting. Default value 7.
params.backgroundROIshift: in [mm]. Background ROI position (relative to phantom centre) for SNR and ghosting. Default value 108
params.image: instance number for geometry. Valid: <number>, firstInSeries, lastInSeries
params.match: Match with DICOM SeriesDescription, or use format @<field>=<content> to match with another DICOM field. Multiple criteria separated by ;
